RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck cam: Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck camper

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: law enforcement agency stopping Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck camper, with agents having received specialized training and participated in numerous incidents involving arrests for transporting illegal aliens
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck cam: vehicle stopped by United States Border Patrol agents more than 100 miles from the United States-Mexican border
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States-Mexican border: geographic boundary relevant to smuggling, considered in determining the legality of stops by roving United States Border Patrol agents
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Brignoni-Ponce: legal standard for evaluating the reasonableness of suspicion in investigatory stops
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States v. Garcia: case involving the use of the Allen charge in trials and the smuggling of undocumented aliens, with jury instructions emphasizing the importance of reaching a verdict after approximately 2 hours of deliberation
